Articles.Content: It looks like you are flying a Moonshine still into space.

It looks like you are flying a Moonshine still into space.

Space Munshine FTW

Very sweet, steampunk fits with the kerbals

http://pho.to/59H82

Edited April 2, 2014 by ahappydude

This is amazing! I love it when people come up with original sets of parts like these. Most of the stuff coming out for mods is all so futuristic, it's refreshing to see people trying to make "old fashioned" technology.
First Steam punk suit is very nearly done. Just need to add "Muttonchops" to head and finish jetpack.
Must...have...columbiad!!!!!
Please make steam punk'd mech jeb module. Oh and a LES system in the shape of a weather vane...

This pack is the perfect solution to the dev's wanting manned flights right away and provides an excuse why computers and probes are useless/not unlocked till later; that still bug's me more than it should. Well, from a Role Playing point of view anyway, I realise that this fall's outside their direction. That was what I thought of when I first saw these parts anyway. Ignoring all that these parts look great and I hope to see more!!

Actually thinking about it I would love to see this take on an interstellar style with a custom tech tree at the start before the stock parts, heck could even have a small whaling ship to collect resources from the ocean on kerbin and various other thing's like a still or some such. Just a thought, it is perfectly fine the way it is and I am sure it will just get better as you progress. I mean, it's STEAM PUNK!!! AND Kerbal's!! The perfect recipe for big explosions in every non existent garage across the planet!! Actually I think you just created the Kerbol extinction event(s) or at least moved it up from when they discover antimatter.

First Steam punk suit is very nearly done. Just need to add "Muttonchops" to head and finish jetpack.

http://i1332.photobucket.com/albums/w615/greenskullinc/steampunknew3_zpsae416d96.png

Sir, I am speechless, your skills are awesome!!!

This pack is the perfect solution to the dev's wanting manned flights right away and provides an excuse why computers and probes are useless/not unlocked till later; that still bug's me more than it should. Well, from a Role Playing point of view anyway, I realise that this fall's outside their direction. That was what I thought of when I first saw these parts anyway. Ignoring all that these parts look great and I hope to see more!!

I am planning on my parts developing a more industrial look as they get larger, Kind of an evolution of steam-tech...

Please make steam punk'd mech jeb module. Oh and a LES system in the shape of a weather vane...

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QbS2-ulVBAQ/T2_iHz7p8iI/AAAAAAAAACg/uTjVDsIAsTA/s1600/WeatherVane.jpg

If i did it would be more like a "Cog-Jeb" Module maybe

It looks like you are flying a Moonshine still into space.

I like the moonshine idea... i could make a resource like Alchohol or RefinedSpirits in a still, and use it as another fuel source...

Could be created from KerbalSnacks and Water!!!!!

I like the moonshine idea... i could make a resource like Alchohol or RefinedSpirits in a still, and use it as another fuel source...

Could be created from KerbalSnacks and Water!!!!!

And the Munshine Alcohol Engine was born... You'd have to put a warning in the description not to drink the Munshine as it may cause blindness and sporadic limb dysfunction. Also not to be used near lady kerbals...

Just an idea for the design - a big copper moonshine styled still with smaller wooden barrels radially attached or stacked for the snacks and water. Could be your primary larger scale engine.

And the Munshine Alcohol Engine was born... You'd have to put a warning in the description not to drink the Munshine as it may cause blindness and sporadic limb dysfunction. Also not to be used near lady kerbals...

Just an idea for the design - a big copper moonshine styled still with smaller wooden barrels radially attached or stacked for the snacks and water. Could be your primary larger scale engine.

Kerbals and snack derived alchohol.... what could possibly go wrong?
new version... minor fixes and a couple of new parts and better techtree distribution.

EVA jetpack is done.

Suit and helmet are done as in previous pic. Currently adding mutton chops to head and then its release time

EVA jetpack is done.

http://i1332.photobucket.com/albums/w615/greenskullinc/steampunkjetpack_zpsc72333e2.png

Suit and helmet are done as in previous pic. Currently adding mutton chops to head and then its release time

Very nice

Now with extra mutton chops and "The Colonel" goatee...

The prof liked his new look so much he went to the Mun to celebrate!

just thought of an idea for your next product: a rocket that uses salami for fuel and nitrous oxide for oxidizer (don't laugh, mythbusters actually did it in episode 64) or maybe parrafin wax and nitrous oxide (proof: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9h60tqow0cQ )

This this mod have steampunk like engine trails?

You know...steam.

Edited April 3, 2014 by EdisonMaxwell
This mod looks so... amazing...

I like the moonshine idea... i could make a resource like Alchohol or RefinedSpirits in a still, and use it as another fuel source...

Could be created from KerbalSnacks and Water!!!!!

Which is surprisingly realistic, because that's exactly what the first manmade object to reach space used IRL It was a German V-2 rocket that the Americans captured and, with its warhead removed, shot straight up to see how high it could go. Its engine ran on a 25% ethanol/75% water fuel, which essentially makes it diluted vodka, with liquid oxygen as an oxidizer. Many other early liquid fuel engines also used alcohol mixtures.

Work is really cutting into my kerbal time...

Edited April 4, 2014 by Kerb-fu
